experience.details: Assisted and supervised students during lab sessions, actively engaging them through practical applications of computer networking concepts such as router and switch configuration fundamentals, and subnetting in Cisco Packet Tracer.

Facilitated hands-on learning in core networking concepts, such as DHCP (IPv4 & IPv6), static and dynamic routing, VLAN configuration, and wireless networking, enabling students to design and implement real-world network infrastructures.
